title: Skill
description: A combined object to describe a skill.

skill.description: The name of the skill (title case).

variables.description: An array of the skill's variable elements. Most often, this is a list of Lore topics.

items.description: A skill's variable element (e.g. "Accounting" and "Midwifery" in "Accounting or Midwifery Lore").

display.description: How the skill should display, if it cannot be trivially inferred from `skill` and `variables`.
